output_dir = os.path.join(BASE_DIR, "data", "csv_exports")

files = glob.glob(os.path.join(output_dir, "*.csv"))

dfs = {}

for file in files:
    key = os.path.basename(file)        
    dfs[key] = pd.read_csv(file)
    print(f"Loaded {key} ({len(dfs[key])} rows)")

keys = list(dfs.keys())

print("\nKeys in dfs:")
print(keys)

for key in keys:

    print(dfs[key].head(), "\n")
